Title: Support Rubick on a side lane

ItemTooltips.blink: A Blink Dagger makes you more mobile. Buy it if you manage to steal a big area-of-effect nuke.
ItemTooltips.ghost: Buy this item if the enemy carry keeps targeting you.
ItemTooltips.courier:
Buy a Courier if nobody bought it.

Other options: Observer Ward.
ItemTooltips.travel_boots: If you are your team's main pusher, buy these Boots.
ItemTooltips.phase_boots: Buy Phase Boots instead of Arcane Boots if you need more mobility and you already have other ways to replenish your mana pool.
ItemTooltips.bracer:
Makes you more durable, and gives good stats.

Other options: Urn of Shadows, Medallion of Courage.
ItemTooltips.mekansm: Buy a Mekansm if nobody is going to buy it. Its heal is great in every situation.
ItemTooltips.ring_of_basilius: Ring of Basilius solves your early mana problems. If you can't manage your mana pool, this item can be really worth the price.
ItemTooltips.pipe: The magic resistance from the Pipe stacks with your aura. Use it against a team with many nukers.
ItemTooltips.urn_of_shadows: Urn of Shadows can be bought instead of a Bracer if you want to gank often, and nobody has got one in your team.
ItemTooltips.sheepstick: Great stats, great mana regeneration, great disable. It costs a lot, but it's worth the price!
ItemTooltips.cyclone: This item solves all of your mana problems. Its active ability can be used to save allies or to temporarily remove an enemy from the battlefield.
ItemTooltips.force_staff: A Force Staff makes you more mobile and can be used to save teammates.
ItemTooltips.shivas_guard: Perfect against carries, or to initiate a battle. The aura and the armor, along with its active ability, make you almost unkillable by auto-attackers.
ItemTooltips.arcane_boots:
Buy Arcane Boots if your team needs more mana, or if you want to spam your spells.

Other options: Phase Boots.
ItemTooltips.ancient_janggo: If you think you need more health and mana, upgrade your bracer into a Drum of Endurance.
ItemTooltips.medallion_of_courage: Pick a Medallion of Courage instead of a Bracer if your lane partner can deal a lot of physical damage in the early game.
ItemTooltips.rod_of_atos: Rod of Atos is perfect if you need more health and an ability to make ganks easier.
